name: Pizza conservatore
description:
The honor and the glory of the pizza is in danger, if you didn´t noticed yet, it´s rainning pineapples! And pizza can´t touch it, cause it will be a disgrace for it´s family. Help the pizza to avoid this problem the longer you can and set a new high score! 
This game uses the gyroscope from your device, so move it to move the pizza and dodge the pineapples.
